nodes.bodyText: It looks like these tests all fail. Should we rework or delete (if we don't need them) as part of this?
I think it would be good to have such tests that confirm that upgrading/downgrading databases work well so I would keep it.

Totally agree that we want that coverage. With forms, it seems we have that covered in FormDatabaseMigratorTest so we could add a similar test for instances and remove this one (so replace the instrumented test with a Robolectric test). That said this PR definitely offers a bunch of good stuff, so we could just create an issue for that?
